name: Djconsole
body:
# DJconsole
Arduino based electric sound console.


![Console](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bullcode/DJconsole/gh-pages/images/console.png)


- Arduino UNO 
- 2 Potentiometers 
- Photoresitor sensor 
- Piezo
- Resistor 10KÎ©


This is my first arduino project. I tried to simulate a simple DJ console. It can change frequency and the delay of sound. It can be also controlled by photoresistor by changing the amount of light around it. Bellow you can see basic arduino uno wiring.

![wiring](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bullcode/DJconsole/gh-pages/images/consolewiring.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
